event.title: found rich silver ore along the steep slopes of the Providence Mountains in the spring of 1880

data.event: Parties of prospectors from Ivanpah found rich silver ore along the steep slopes of the Providence Mountains in the spring of 1880.

event.title: was built at the nearby Perseverance Mine in 1886

data.event: A 5-stamp mill was built at the nearby Perseverance Mine in 1886, but the price of silver continued to slip, and the post office closed in 1892.
A 5-stamp mill was built at the nearby Perseverance Mine in 1886, but the price of silver continued to slip, and the post office closed in 1892.
